page.title: 02TWO LOCAL PERSONALITIES
page.content: A retired village personality has written a book.It is called "Vat Sal be Sal" which means "What Shall be Shall" and is about the history of the interesting sites,buildings and people of Harewood.It took him 6 years to complete and 500 copies were produced. They were all quickly sold.His main sources were the people, through interviews,but he also used books.The work has gone all over the world. He also gives audio-visual shows and lectures to various organisations. Attendance ranges between 9 and 150. His wife and son are both poets.His wife has been on 'Radio Leeds',has had a book of poems published,and won the first prize for a poem at the Harrogate Festival.His son has had 2 books of poems published.
